name: Lazavik
description: Lazavik is a small fey creature with a single brilliant golden eye and an affinity for swampy environments, excelling in mobility and survival.
memorable: It has unique abilities enhancing allies' movement and can communicate with beasts.
goals: Assist allies in navigating difficult terrain and achieve harmony with swamp creatures.
relations: May interact with other fey and swamp-dwelling creatures.
environment: Primarily found in swamps and marshes.
strengths: Exceptional Dexterity provides agility and stealth capability.
weaknesses: Limited offensive damage output compared to larger foes.
attacks: Uses a Reed Whip for slashing attacks and can unleash a blinding Eye Flare.
most_powerful_ability: Eye Flare, which deals radiant damage and can blind foes.
senses: Has passive perception of 17, making it highly perceptive.
skills: Skilled in stealth and perception, allowing it to navigate and evade effectively.
additional_information: Immune to frightened and poisoned conditions.
Can hold its breath for 30 minutes.
Illuminates an area to assist allies with its Glowing Eye ability.
Moves freely through marshy terrain with Swamp Stride.
test_queries: tiny swamp fey with glowing eye
agile creature that communicates with beasts
supportive fey that helps in marshes
creature with blinding radiant flare ability
fey with impressive stealth and perception skills
